original_text: For the idols have spoken vanity, and the diviners have seen a lie, and have told false dreams; they comfort in vain: therefore they went their way as a flock, they were troubled, because there was no shepherd.
korean_text: 드라빔들은 허탄한 것을 말하며 복술자는 진실하지 않은 것을 보고 거짓 꿈을 말한즉 그 위로가 헛되므로 백성들이 양 같이 유리하며 목자가 없으므로 곤고를 당하나니

sentences.original_text: For the idols have spoken vanity
and the diviners have seen a lie
therefore they went their way as a flock
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그들은 양 떼처럼 그들의 길을 갔으며
